item.title: HOOD
item.description: score:-181 Chances: Robinhood Markets is expanding its suite of products and offerings, including a new credit card and options for retirement savings, indicating growth and diversification. The company’s focus on providing commission-free stock trading with no account minimums and fractional share trading has made it a popular choice among retail investors.
